subject: Order number SSN3460
description_text:
I'd like to start off with saying that I am incredibly sorry for this
inconvenience.

 I ordered a Simsonn 6+R H pattern shifter on November 13 2025 and recently
performed a charge back that I now regret doing. I had the charge back done
as the last movement on the package said it has arrived in Ottawa Ontario
Canada but was at the YYZ airport (Toronto Person International). I
attempted to call the number provided on your companies website to find out
that it is a phone number in China not England. Out of frustration I called
my credit card company and had a charge back done on November 29 as I felt
that with having two different airports listed as the arrival and no
movement on the tracking app I assumed it was not going to be delivered or
delivered anywhere near on time. I continued to check the app even after
the charge back to see there was still no updates on tracking. On November
30 the package was delivered to my door. I then checked the SF
INTERNATIONALS tracking and all of a sudden things had changed. I feel very
bad over this and would like to make it right and fix this. I ordered this
for my husband as he loves your products we have bought in the past. How do
I make this right and repay for this order? We want to keep the item. Again
I am very sorry for this and want to make things right and pay for this.

Thank You

 Danielle Temple

conversations.body_text: Hi Danielle Temple,     We apologize for the inconvenience. We note that the package was delivered to your doorstep on November 29th. Please try to locate the item or ask family members or neighbors if they signed for it on your behalf. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=GV25CAA0U048350839

I sent a second email about this order. I ended up doing a charge back over
the whole confusion with SF INTERNATIONAL not updating their
tracking information. I want to repay for this as we did receive it AFTER
I did the charge back. How do I pay for it now?

On Wed, Dec 3, 2025, 9:16â€¯p.m. service@simsonn.com
Hi Danielle Temple,     Thank you for your understanding. You can click the link to pay the fee. You are truly kind. God bless you.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference
